name: CS340_Final_Project
description: Dynamic content with Express and Handlebars

scripts.build: handlebars views/partials/book/book-info-row.handlebars -f public/script/book-info-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/book/book-mod-row.handlebars -f public/script/book-mod-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/store/store-info-row.handlebars -f public/script/store-info-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/store/store-mod-row.handlebars -f public/script/store-mod-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/vend/vend-info-row.handlebars -f public/script/vend-info-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/vend/vend-mod-row.handlebars -f public/script/vend-mod-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/buy/buy-info-row.handlebars -f public/script/buy-info-row-template.js && handlebars views/partials/buy/buy-info-foot.handlebars -f public/script/buy-info-foot-template.js

author: Luan Songjian
